name: Kookaburra

The reason for this is his reputation, which sounds like he's laughing.He likes to do this early in the morning and often luring locals and visitors out of bed.- belongs to the genus of kingfishers(Eisvogel)- 45 centimetres long, 500g weight (adult) - found in east`, south Australia and Tasmania He likes places nearbodies of water and in tree-rich areas
